name: Shimano DEORE XT PD-M8140 Flat Pedals
description: Stay in charge with Shimano's Deore XT Trail Flat Pedal. Designed with a concave surface for efficient power transfer for all-day riding fun. With the choice of 10 long or short pins per side, you can mix with mud on technical terrain while maintaining grip.All-mountain flat pedal with concave surface.Light but durable aluminum body.Strong, durable chromoly spindle with 8mm hex wrench mount.Sealed bearing system to withstand mud and water.10 pins per side (long or short) for enhanced grip.Reflective detail.Recommended sizes: SM for 36-44; ML for 43-48;
